H0.text: Lungs are the paired organs enclosed within a cavity surrounded by the pleura.

H1.text: Bones are each of the paired organs that are enclosed within a cavity surrounded by the pleura.

H2.text: Ovaries are each of the paired organs that are enclosed within a cavity surrounded by the pleura.

H3.text: Heart is the paired organ that is enclosed within a cavity surrounded by the pleura.

A4.text: The two lungs, each bounded by a two-layered pleural sac, almost fill the thoracic cavity.
